attributes.action: MPs elected on delivering Brexit manifesto, now supporting remain should resign.
attributes.background: All MPs elected on delivering Brexit in last election and now trying to stop/delay/support second referendum should resign first and go back to the people in their constituencies and rerun the election. People have voted and now respect the People and the vote.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions
